message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll take 75% and you get 25%.
I'll split it 50/50, but I'm willing to negotiate
I'm not willing to split it 50/50. I'll make a new offer: I'll take 60% and you get 40%. Let's see if you're willing to accept.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need to get a good chunk of the money. Let's see if you'll accept this offer.
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm still trying to get a decent amount
Alright, I'll accept your offer. I'll take $450,000 and you get $550,000.
